Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
01.08.2013 SH SCR17603 Repalced storing of DCLN rows by creating directly a BSP106 file to achieve partial handling
of a debtor file (rows without errors are handled via BSP106)
30.10.2012 SH SCR17603 Restored backup
29.07.2010 SH SCR15201 Added GB007.PI.LANGUAGE = CLNT201_LANGUAGE
08.08.2008 SH SCR13637 Set Nat.Reg.Number to blank if not valid and a debtor
client number is received
-- Program is finished if all lines are read from inputfile or if
>= v.GSET_QUANTITY(372) errors are detected, if v.GSET_QUANTITY(372) = 0 the program handles all rows.
-- No errors are detected, handle the whole file via BSP106
... else handle only all rows without errors via BSP106
... else delete the temporary file (handing is not possible, too many errors found in file)
-- Set variables
-- Get directory (35) to store new debtor file
... prepare sub directory to generate the new file
... try to create sub directory if not exists
... error in case of sub directory can't be read / created
-- Be carefully with changing the sequenece, adding new input fields, see R.P.
where VarSet is used to extract the fields from a generic input row
.. in case of new fields have to be added, see R.S. where the extracting of
input fields has to be extended
-- End input fields
-- Input variables with proper numeric FL pictures
-- Previous values of input variables, have to be tested only in case of changes
-- Database fields uses to store DCLN, fetched already during validations
-- Validation and error handling
-- Init following check variables to test if there is a change with values which
never exists
(if using default values then the program never detects empty / 0 fields)
-- If at least one NFER (error) row is stored set PO.ERROR = TRUE
-- Define the handling type if at least one row is stored to BSP106 file and no
errors are detected (not if uploaded via website --> PI.NFIR_IFIL_ID = 0)
-- Set error flag to enable storing of MQ188 in BSP200 if client is not allowed
to send debtor files (PO.RUNTYPE has to be defined for these clients)
-- Reset variables
-- Read complete row from input file
-- Always replace semicolon (;) by comma (,) if inside double quotes
(e.g. "TEST ; AB") because semicolons are used as separator between
columns (Info: CHR(34) = ';' --> semicolon)
-- Extract all 20 fields (90 file format) from input row
... removed possible double quotes from fields, also more than only one
leading/trailing double quote, e.g. "Test" or ""Test""
... write extracted value from input field to related variable
-- First line should contain a header row, in this case ignore this line and
blank lines have to be ignored
-- Error --> Recordflag not 90
-- Handle detail records (90)
... set record flag for BSP202-20, uses to set the runtype
... always update NFIR_ADMNO / NFIR_CLNTNO for first row where adminstration or
client exist
-- Program is finished if all lines are read from inputfile or if
v.GSET_QUANTITY(372) errors are detected ( v.GSET_QUANTITY(372) = 0, means no end of program)
-- Inform users that testing is stopped because of >= v.GSET_QUANTITY(372) errors
-- Reset variables
... replace string in original file row which contains a semicolon by a string
where the semicolon is replaced by a comma
-- Check / delete leading double quotes (chr(34))
-- Check / delete trainling double quotes (chr(34))
... fetch error text
-- Format input fields to their proper FL pictures
-- Check for existing client (only once or in case of changes)
-- Error --> Client does not exisrts
-- Stop further testing, client is not allowed to send debtor files
-- Check debtor number
... error --> debtor number = blank or only contains '0' characters
-- Check debtor name (must be <> blank)
===== House address ====
-- Check street (must be <> blank)
-- Check city (must be <> blank)
-- Check country code (only in case of changes)
-- Error --> Country code does not exisrts
===== Postal address ====
(if one of the 3 postal address fields <> blank, all three are mandatory)
-- Check country code (only in case of changes)
-- Error --> Country code does not exisrts
-- Check language --> optional field (only in case of changes)
-- Error --> Language code does not exisrts
-- Validate national registration number (at the end because country code must
be fetched / validated before)
... fetch error text
... move new debtor file from sub directory \build to final directory(35)
... moving of new debtor failed, job is turned to MSGW
